dmca.title: Notification of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Zimmerman, Tobias [mailto:TZimmerman@AKINGUMP.COM] 
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2005 6:14 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Pierce, Anthony; Kepchar, Karol; sf@forman-ent.com
Subject: Notification of Copyright Infringement
Importance: High

 

Please see attached letter.

 

Tobias E. Zimmerman

Akin, Gump, Strauss, Hauer & Feld, L.L.P.

Robert S. Strauss Building

1333 New Hampshire Ave., N.W.

Washington, D.C. 20036

+1.202.887.4410 (voice)

+1.202.955.7789 (facsimile)

e-mail:  <mailto:tzimmerman@akingump.com> tzimmerman@akingump.com

web:  <http://www.akingump.com/> http://www.akingump.com/

 

The information contained in this e-mail message is intended only for the
personal and confidential use of the recipient(s) named above. This message
may be an attorney-client communication and/or work product and as such is
privileged and confidential. If the reader of this message is not the
intended recipient or an agent responsible for delivering it to the intended
recipient, you are hereby notified that you have received this document in
error and that any review, dissemination, distribution, or copying of this
message is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in
error, please notify us immediately by e-mail, and delete the original
message.
dmca.sender_name: Akin, Gump, Strauss, Hauer & Feld, L.L.P.
dmca.principal_name: Akin, Gump, Strauss, Hauer & Feld, L.L.P. (For Blackside Inc.)
